tasks: Creating resources utilizing HTML, CSS, and jQuery on Salesforce and Confluence.
Utilizing JIRA to communicate and track known issues.

Managing online forums and media for technical issues: gathering information to diagnose mass issues needed for other departments for diagnosis,  communicating known issues, creating guides and announcements, moderating and gathering feedback to forward to appropriate teams.
Providing assistance and guidance to others with technical concerns or issues.
Advising and providing information to other departments with diagnosis or prognosis for improvements on technical issues.
Taking escalations from other departments for high-priority issues.
Maintaining higher expectations and guiding others.
Mentoring and providing feedback to team members and other departments.
Introducing and guiding new training groups in other departments.
Managing and leading multiple projects involving internal tools, knowledge base, and training.
